nodes.text: Magali Villeneuve (born 1980) is a French illustrator who has provided art for Fantasy Flight Games' Edge of the Empire, The Card Game, Age of Rebellion, and Force and Destiny, as well as several Star Wars Insider short stories, including "Constant Spirit", "Journey into Darkness," and "Kindred Spirits."
Villeneuve has also drawn a promotional artwork for Del Rey's novel Razor's Edge, written by Martha Wells.
